text: The 2011 Sha Tin District Council election was held on 6 November 2011 to elect all 36 elected members to the 43-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:16.67%;" | 6 | style="background:red; width:83.33%;" | 30 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:25%;" | 9 | style="background:red; width:75%;" | 27 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== ==External links== * Election Results - Overall Results Category:2011 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2011 Sha Tin District Council election
